original_text: And a man was there with a withered hand. And they asked him, “Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath?”—so that they might accuse him.
korean_text: 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 있는지라 사람들이 예수를 고발하려 하여 물어 이르되 안식일에 병 고치는 것이 옳으니이까

sentences.original_text: And a man was there with a withered hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 마른 손을 가진 한 사람이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath?
so that they might accuse him.
